line_1: Nae doubt but they were fain o' ither,
line_2: An' unco pack an' thick thegither;

line_1: But hear their absent thoughts o' ither,
line_2: They're a run deils an' jads thegither.

line_1: We've been owre lang unkenn'd to ither:
We've been owre lang unkenn'd to ither:
line_2: Now let us lay our heads thegither,

line_1: We've been owre lang unkenn'd to ither:
line_2: May Envy wallop in a tether,
